meta_title: SWMS Licensing Requirements Australia: The Competency Myth
meta_description: Confused about SWMS licensing requirements in Australia? Stop looking for a license application. Learn the truth about competency, HRWL, and PCBU obligations.
title: Stop Looking for a SWMS License: Understanding Competency vs. Licensing in Australian WHS

hero_image.alt: Hero image for Stop Looking for a SWMS License: Understanding Competency vs. Licensing in Australian WHS

image_prompt: A photo-realistic, high-quality image set in a modern Australian industrial manufacturing facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of maintenance technicians (men and women) are gathered around a large piece of industrial machinery. They are wearing full PPE including hard hats, high-visibility vests with reflective strips, safety glasses, and steel-capped boots. One technician is holding a rugged tablet, showing the screen to a supervisor; the screen is not clearly visible but implies a digital workflow. The background is slightly blurred but shows a clean, organized factory floor with yellow safety walkways and lockout/tagout stations. The lighting is bright and professional, emphasizing a culture of safety and compliance. No text or words should be visible in the image.
